org.apache.polygene.library.sql.generator.grammar.modification

Interface ColumnSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Typeable<ColumnSource>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ColumnSourceByQuery, ColumnSourceByValues, DynamicColumnSource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ColumnSource.Defaults, ColumnSourceByQueryImpl, ColumnSourceByValuesImpl, DynamicColumnSourceImpl

    public interface ColumnSource
extends Typeable<ColumnSource>
    This is common interface for syntax elements representing the data source for columns in INSERT INTO statement.
    See Also:
    InsertStatement

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ColumnSource.Defaults
      This syntax element represents when default values of columns are wanted to be inserted into table.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.polygene.library.sql.generator.Typeable
